title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizea, use lib_summary().
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() #>                                                                           Library #> 1                                              C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2 C:/Users/Shane Fernandez/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpA9VSSg/temp_libpath50fc11d31be3 #>   n_packages #> 1        186 #> 2          1  # specify size = TRUE  lib_summary(size = TRUE) #>                                                                           Library #> 1                                              C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2 C:/Users/Shane Fernandez/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpA9VSSg/temp_libpath50fc11d31be3 #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1        186 299612973 #> 2          1     13298

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: size logical value indicating whether calculate sizes. Defaul = FALSE

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.fame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(size = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72832284 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
